review: Turns your dumb tv into a "smart" tv. It pretty much does everything apple tv does, but so much cheaper and you can get the app and use your phone as the remote.
author: Allyson Baylon

review: While it works just as great as a smart TV does, what I don't like about this particular device is that it won't work ubless it plugged into to power source as well as television. So you can't just grab it and go like a true portable device.

review: I have a fire tv and now in my room the fire tv stick and i am very happy.

review: It was very easy to install - and works great - so glad we ordered it from Amazon- as prime members we have a great selection of shows to choose from.
author: Frances Titus

review: Works great, especially with the phone app. The phone app allows you to use voice recognition.
author: Carlo DeSando III

review: I didn't expect the USB power cord that must be attached, but suppose I should have.  Wish it was a little longer! Otherwise I LOVE this product.
author: Sierra Pedroza

review: Love this! We use it on a tv in the bedroom that has no cable outlet or box and it allows us to stream shows and movies easily. Previously, I would stream amazon though my kindle, which also works well, but the kindle had to stay plugged into the tv with an HDMI so I would have to get up to browse for shows to watch. The fire stick has a remote which allows me to be truly lazy and flip through content from wherever I am in the room.
author: Amanda M.
